channel.title: You must love the torrent speed of
channel.description:
open source software...
thanks to http://software.opensuse.org/ and my descision to install openSUSE KDE, i have just experianced my highest ever download speed on utorrent, in excess of 600 kb/s. IT UNREAL!
[url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://img3.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/9a86ada525.gif[/img][/url]

All you guys are talking about how fast you can dwonlaod-100kbps plus.
I can download at 30 kbps. Yay.

Read full topic

item.title: You must love the torrent speed of
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Speljohan:

That’s pretty nice. My max is 2.3MB/s from torrents. www.torrentleech.com is the way to go

fucking word, TL is the win. i max at 1.9MB/s due to my line but still its awesome. When the invites are open again ill have a few spare to invite you guys, <3

Read full topic
item.source: You must love the torrent speed of

item.title: You must love the torrent speed of
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sup000, post:18, topic:157403”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=214623.msg1872522#msg1872522 date=1194403290]
but if you should Cap upload so much that download will not go down.
[/quote]

i didnt understand that bit AT ALL[/quote]
You maybe only need 1/10 of the max download speed for the Upload speed.

So if a download only goes 500/KBps i think you only need 50 KBps Up.

Web browsing goes slower if you use too much of your upload speed to your torrents.

Read full topic

item.source: You must love the torrent speed of

item.title: You must love the torrent speed of
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sup000, post:16, topic:157403”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=214623.msg1872482#msg1872482 date=1194402215]

Holly crap that’s fast, it took me 3 weeks to download NFS Pro Street. Does Opera slow it down or something?

Opera is not the best thing to download Torrents, if you use it, Use Opera 9.5 Alfa, it download something at 200 that work only at 50 on normal version.

You should use µTorrent, its better, and you can choose how much upspeed you want to use.

[/quote]

im pretty sure upload is relative to download. You cap upload, it caps download[/quote]
That right, but if you should Cap upload so much that download will not go down.

Read full topic

item.source: You must love the torrent speed of

item.title: You must love the torrent speed of
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“sup000, post:8, topic:157403”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=214623.msg1872210#msg1872210 date=1194397210]
That’s pretty nice. My max is 2.3MB/s from torrents. www.torrentleech.com is the way to go
[/quote]

now that IS fast. I honestly have no idea of my download speed according to Sky, but it honestly is the fastest i have personally gained. One for the books today

To my knowledge, torrent speed has way more to do with seeders/peers than what kind of software it is.

and, yes, of course[/quote]

And to think I’m pretty happy with downloading at 220-250kb/s

Read full topic

Schizzo:

To my knowledge, torrent speed has way more to do with seeders/peers than what kind of software it is.

and, yes, of course

FYI 694MB in 15.4 mins¬!
